title: Declaration of intent concerning Vivendi’s equity interest in Ubisoft and Gameloft (Vivendi SA)
text: ( Source : Vivendi SA ) Paris , October 26 , 2015 Declaration of intent concerning Vivendi's equity interest in Ubisoft and Gameloft To supplement the communication of October 22 , 2015, regarding its equity interest increase in Ubisoft
